column5: This upstairs studio apartment is a cozy place for two guests. Feel relaxed the moment you step inside to a comforting color palette and beachy theme. Internet and cable TV for your comfort. Kitchenette stocked with pots, pans, and utensils. French doors lead to a balcony that overlooks the courtyard and catches the cool ocean breeze. Enjoy a variety of plants and trailing vines.
